function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on AI for COVID-19 detection and prediction","Impact":"Misdiagnosis or incorrect predictions leading to unprepared healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Validation of AI predictions with traditional methods, continuous monitoring of AI accuracy","Technologies":"AI validation tools, continuous monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare providers, LMICs","Owner":"Healthcare providers, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate exploration of AI utilities in healthcare","Impact":"Missed opportunities for improving healthcare services and response to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Encourage research and development of AI-based tools, promote collaboration between AI developers and healthcare institutions","Technologies":"AI development platforms, collaboration platforms","People":"Healthcare providers, AI developers, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research institutions"},{"Description":"Potential conflicts of interest in research and publication","Impact":"Risk of biased or inaccurate information being presented to the public","Mitigation":"Transparency and disclosure of conflicts of interest, independent review of research and publications","Technologies":"Publication ethics software, independent review systems","People":"Researchers, authors, journal editors","Owner":"Research institutions, journal publishers"}]}
